In England, in the seven days to 08 April, there were 13,853 new confirmed cases (24.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 April, there were 21,652 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 36% (7,799 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 April is 20,772,220 (36,732.4 cases per 100,000 population).
